title: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
subtitle: Drugged Drink
series: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
tagline: Some hostels are a bargain. Others cost you your life.

synopsis.short: A trusting solo traveler accepts a spiked drink from a charming stranger at the hostel bar and dies from a fatal drug overdose while being robbed.

death_teaser: Never accept drinks from strangers. Especially friendly ones.
